clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Leningrado Association in the Treatment of Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Double-blind, Double-dummy, National, Phase III Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Leningrado Association in the Treatment of Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Leningrado association on the treatment of hypertension.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in systolic blood pressure levels, as measured by ABPM at the initial visit and final visit.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of adverse events recorded during the study

arm_group.description: The study is double-dummy. Thus, the patient will take 2 tablets, as follow: 1 tablet Leningrado association and 1 tablet Natrilix® SR placebo, oral, once a day.
The study is double-dummy. Thus, the patient will take 2 tablets, as follow: 1 tablet Natrilix® SR 1,5 mg and 1 tablet Leningrado association placebo, oral, once a day.
